title: Create test Beads repository for migration testing
description: Sample Beads repo with realistic data (50-100 issues, various types, dependencies). Test migration produces valid Taskulus project.
creator: Ryan Alyn Porter

custom.beads_notes:
Plan: create specs/fixtures/beads_repo with minimal .beads/issues.jsonl (epic + task, dependency + comment) and supporting metadata file for migration tests.
Added specs/fixtures/beads_repo/.beads/issues.jsonl with two issues (epic + task) including dependency and comment; added metadata.json to mirror Beads layout for migration tests.
custom.beads_close_reason: Created fixture Beads repository under specs/fixtures/beads_repo with issues.jsonl and metadata.json.
